Compatible with iOS 7, 8, 9, 10!

All-in-one Safari customization tool!

Features:

- Mini Toolbar
- Flat Style URL
- Hide Status Bar
- Fullscreen Scrolling
- Pixelated Progress Bar
- Smaller Favorites Icons
- Hide Frequently Visited Sites
- Custom Number of Favorites Icons Per Row

Configure options from Settings.

1.5.1 (New additon) - Hide top hits/bookmarks/history in URL search v1.5 (New additions) - Custom color choice (for URL text, tab bar icons & progress bar) - Always in 'Private Browsing Mode' option - Hide 'Private Browsing Mode Text' option v1.4 (Bug fixes/Paid)
- Few bug fixes making some features non responsive have been fixed


v1.3.1 (Bug Fix)

- Fixed bug that was causing frequently visited sites to still show


v1.3 (New options/Fixed PreferenceBundle error)

- Finally FIXED PreferenceBundle not loading, everyone can update to the latest version now! Sorry for the wait guys.

- Disable/hide History view
- Disable/hide Favorites/Bookmark view
- Added a 'Respring' button


v1.2.1 (Preference bundle fix.. maybe)

Some users have reported missing Preference bundles error in v1.2. I am not sure what is causing this error as this tweak is compiled for armv7/arm64 devices and is a random bug on older/newer iOS's and devices without reason. If this update does not fix the error for the users affected please downgrade to Safari Tools v1.1. This bug may be caused by PreferenceLoader but I can not be sure.

The most confusing part would be for example that this works for one iPhone 6, iOS 10 but then another user with the same device and iOS would get an error..

Please follow me on Twitter for support, updates and feedback!
